subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Shock signed center Kelly Schumacher to a contract for the rest of the W.N.B.A. season. Terms were not disclosed. The 6-5 Schumacher came off the bench in all 34 games last season with the Phoenix Mercury, the league champion, averaging 4.4 points and 4.3 rebounds in 16 minutes.
